attributes.action: Call for a state of the art respite, treatment and training centre to be established in Northern Ireland for Veterans and their families.
attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to make the MOD / Goverment aware of the desire for the Northern Irish population of ex- service personnel, their families and supporters to have a state of the art respite, treatment and training centre established within Northern Ireland for all veterans. AA Veterans Support is currently carrying out a survey to ask veterans and their families what facilities and other elements should be taken into account when planning the establishment of such a centre, you can see the survey here http://www.surveymonkey.com/Home_Landing.aspx?sm=4zlFZdyal9CXxp9n%2ftn5BNanISj5rYBlNM%2f4Zb%2bGozE%3d
